text: The 2015–16 season is Levski Sofia's 95th season in the First League. This article shows player statistics and all matches (official and friendly) that the club has played during the 2015–15 season. ==Summary== ==Transfers== ===In=== Total spending: ===Out=== Total Income: Net income: ===Loans out=== ==Squad== :Updated on 17 November 2016. {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:left; font-size:100%; width:100%;" |- !
